hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set +x
repo_server=121.36.53.23
# 以下测试下载时使用 # fileserver_tmpfile_path="/repo/soe/check_item" # comment_file=${repo}_test_${prid}_aarch64_comment # scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:${fileserver_tmpfile_path}/${comment_file} . || echo ${comment_file}" download faild" # exit
#shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check
# 测试 shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check2 git clone -b feature/openeuler-test https://gitee.com/alichinese/openeuler-jenkins ${shell_path}
. ${shell_path}/src/lib/lib.sh owner="openeuler"
echo "comment ${repo}" export PYTHONPATH=${shell_path}
fileserver_tmpfile_path="/repo/soe/check_item"
aarch64_qemu_image_standard="aarch64_\(qemu-image-standard\)" aarch64_qemu_image_tiny="aarch64_\(qemu-image-tiny\)" arm_qemu_image_standard="arm_\(qemu-image-standard\)" arm_qemu_image_tiny="arm_\(qemu-image-tiny\)" comment_aarch64_qemu_image_standard_file=${repo}_${prid}_${aarch64_qemu_image_standard}_test_comment comment_aarch64_qemu_image_tiny_file=${repo}_${prid}_${aarch64_qemu_image_tiny}_test_comment comment_arm_qemu_image_standard_file=${repo}_${prid}_${arm_qemu_image_standard}_test_comment comment_arm_qemu_image_tiny_file=${repo}_${prid}_${arm_qemu_image_tiny}_test_comment
scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:${fileserver_tmpfile_path}/${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_standard_file} . || echo "file ${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_standard_file} not exist" scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:${fileserver_tmpfile_path}/${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_tiny_file} . || echo "file ${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_tiny_file} not exist" scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:${fileserver_tmpfile_path}/${comment_arm_qemu_image_standard_file} . || echo "file ${comment_arm_qemu_image_standard_file} not exist" scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:${fileserver_tmpfile_path}/${comment_arm_qemu_image_tiny_file} . || echo "file ${comment_arm_qemu_image_tiny_file} not exist"
#if [[ -f ${comment_aarch64_file} -a -f ${comment_arm_file} ]];then python3 ${shell_path}/src/build/gitee_comment_openeuler.py -o $owner -r $repo -p $prid -c $committer -t $giteetoken -u $jenkins_user -j $jenkins_api_token -m ${commentid} -a ${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_standard_file} ${comment_aarch64_qemu_image_tiny_file} ${comment_arm_qemu_image_standard_file} ${comment_arm_qemu_image_tiny_file} # fi set -x
